item.title: Using Markdown for Static Pages in Rails
item.description: Markdown is great for formatting our writing to be publish as HTML. If you’re a developer, you probably used Markdown before. README of GitHub repositories are mostly written in Markdown. While developing web applications, there will be static pages such as about page and FAQ page. Most of the time, we have to write it in HTML, which can be unpleasant.
